Shivah:

Shivah smiled devily and said "Well, his spark could be useful, and 
we have thre bots more to capture"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit/KitKat2::
> 
> "Well Shivah, he said that he was only here to find his allies. 
Nothing
> more."
> DrillBit thinks a second.
> "Honey, lets show why we are Predacons! Remove his spark!" Orders
> DrillBit.
> "Of course love," says KitKat, as she orders some of the drones to 
hold
> Foxfingers while the others remove his spark.
> 
> Two drones hold Foxfingers as another starts to extract his spark.
